mapper.sql: id, name, service_tel, province, city, district, contacts, contacts_phone, address, remark, create_user, create_time, is_delete
mapper.select: select , (SELECT count(*) FROM equipment WHERE company_id in (SELECT id FROM company WHERE provider_id in (SELECT id FROM provider WHERE create_user=#{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}))) eqsCount from provider
mapper.update: update provider set is_delete = #{isDelete} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into provider (id, name, service_tel, province, city, district, contacts, contacts_phone, address, remark, create_user, create_time, is_delete) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{district,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update provider
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER},

create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
